FuncDef:
The anti-attack fragment enable command enables defense against packet fragment attacks.
The anti-attack fragment disable command disables defense against packet fragment attacks.
The undo anti-attack fragment enable command disables defense against packet fragment attacks. The anti-attack fragment enable command enables defense against packet fragment attacks. The anti-attack fragment disable command disables defense against packet fragment attacks. The undo anti-attack fragment enable command disables defense against packet fragment attacks. By default, defense against packet fragment attacks is enabled.
